attributes.value:
var stage = 'clsa-dcs-f1.ContraIndications:'
var sections={
'ICQ_COF1':[  
'ICQ_ABDTUBE_COF1',
'ICQ_ABLESTND_COF1',
'ICQ_ABLEWLK_COF1',
'ICQ_ANEURY_COF1',
'ICQ_ARMCST_COF1',
'ICQ_ARMSWL_COF1',
'ICQ_BARSWAL_COF1',
'ICQ_BLDSP3MO_COF1',
'ICQ_BLDTR24H_COF1',
'ICQ_CATIME_COF1',
'ICQ_CATRCT2_COF1',
'ICQ_CATRCTS_COF1',
'ICQ_CATRCT_COF1',
'ICQ_CHEMO4WK_COF1',
'ICQ_COCHLIMP_COF1',
'ICQ_CTLENS2_COF1',
'ICQ_CTLENS_COF1',
'ICQ_DEFIBR_COF1',
'ICQ_DERET3MO_COF1',
'ICQ_EARINF_COF1',
'ICQ_EMB6WK_COF1',
'ICQ_EMBMED_COF1',
'ICQ_EYEINF_COF1',
'ICQ_FXANK_COF1',
'ICQ_FXARM_COF1',
'ICQ_FXBACK_COF1',
'ICQ_FXCHK_COF1',
'ICQ_FXCOLLR_COF1',
'ICQ_FXFT_COF1',
'ICQ_FXHIP_COF1',
'ICQ_FXHND_COF1',
'ICQ_FXJAW_COF1',
'ICQ_FXKNEE_COF1',
'ICQ_FXLEG_COF1',
'ICQ_FXNECK_COF1',
'ICQ_FXNOSE_COF1',
'ICQ_FXPELV_COF1',
'ICQ_FXRIB_COF1',
'ICQ_FXSHLD_COF1',
'ICQ_FXSKL_COF1',
'ICQ_FXWRST_COF1',
'ICQ_FX_COF1',
'ICQ_GLASSES2_COF1',
'ICQ_GLASSES_COF1',
'ICQ_GLAUC_COF1',
'ICQ_HAEMO_COF1',
'ICQ_HNDCST_COF1',
'ICQ_HNDHMT_COF1',
'ICQ_HNDSWL_COF1',
'ICQ_HRAID2_COF1',
'ICQ_HRAID_COF1',
'ICQ_HRTCOND_COF1',
'ICQ_HRWORKING_COF1',
'ICQ_ILLLUNG_COF1',
'ICQ_INHALERLONG_COF1',
'ICQ_INHALERSHORT_COF1',
'ICQ_JOINTARM_COF1',
'ICQ_LAMIN_COF1',
'ICQ_LEGCST_COF1',
'ICQ_LEGSWL_COF1',
'ICQ_NGTUBE_COF1',
'ICQ_NUCLMED_48H_COF1',
'ICQ_NUCLMED_COF1',
'ICQ_NUCLMED_IV24H_COF1',
'ICQ_PACEMKR_COF1',
'ICQ_POLIO_COF1',
'ICQ_PREGNTWK_COF1',
'ICQ_PREGNT_COF1',
'ICQ_PROEYE_COF1',
'ICQ_PROSARM_COF1',
'ICQ_PROSFT_COF1',
'ICQ_PROSHIP_COF1',
'ICQ_PROSHND_COF1',
'ICQ_PROSKNEE_COF1',
'ICQ_PROSLEG_COF1',
'ICQ_PROSLIM_COF1',
'ICQ_RISEASSI_COF1',
'ICQ_RISECANE_COF1',
'ICQ_SRG3MO_COF1',
'ICQ_SRGYABD_COF1',
'ICQ_SRGYARM_COF1',
'ICQ_SRGYART_COF1',
'ICQ_SRGYCHT_COF1',
'ICQ_SRGYEYE_COF1',
'ICQ_SRGYHND_COF1',
'ICQ_SRGYHRT_COF1',
'ICQ_SRGYOT_COF1',
'ICQ_TINNIT_COF1']
}

var str = []
for(var key in sections) {
  var rcount = 0
  var qcount = 0
  var arr = sections[key]
  for(var i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) {
    var j = $(stage + arr[i])
    if(j.isNull().value()) {
      continue
    }  
    qcount++
    rcount += j.any('REFUSED').value() ? 1 : 0
  }
  if(0 == qcount) {
    str.push(null)
  } else {
    str.push(100.0*rcount/qcount)
  }
}  
newSequence(str, 'decimal')
